suite.name: Authentication Tests

test.name: Scenario: Standard user logins successfully

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Given Peny is on the login page
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Location
kw.doc: Returns the current browser window URL.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: When Peny inserts their default username
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And Peny inserts their default password
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And Peny clicks the login button
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Peny should see the inventory page
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Location
kw.doc: Returns the current browser window URL.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

test.doc:
Successfull outcome when standard credentials are used.
Relevant Business Rules: - User must be redirected to the inventory page after a sucessfull login
Bugs: <link-to-issue-tracker>
